info.name: Yapily API
info.description: Visit the [Yapily API Reference](https://docs.yapily.com/api) for more information

response.name: 200 OK Response

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Expires
header.description: Gives the date/time after which the response is considered stale

header.name: Location
header.description: Used in redirection, or when a new resource has been created.

header.name: Pragma
header.description: Implementation-specific headers that may have various effects anywhere along the request-response chain.

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Strict-Transport-Security
header.description: A HSTS Policy informing the HTTP client how long to cache the HTTPS only policy and whether this applies to subdomains.

header.name: X-Content-Type-Options
header.description: The only defined value, "nosniff", prevents Internet Explorer from MIME-sniffing a response away from the declared content-type

header.name: X-Frame-Options
header.description: Clickjacking protection: "deny" - no rendering within a frame, "sameorigin" - no rendering if origin mismatch

header.name: X-XSS-Protection
header.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) filter

header.name: Strict-Transport-Security
header.description: A HSTS Policy informing the HTTP client how long to cache the HTTPS only policy and whether this applies to subdomains.

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

header.description: The only defined value, "nosniff", prevents Internet Explorer from MIME-sniffing a response away from the declared content-type

header.description: Clickjacking protection: "deny" - no rendering within a frame, "sameorigin" - no rendering if origin mismatch

header.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) filter

request.description:
Used to retrieve a `consentToken` in exchange for a `oneTimeToken`. One time tokens cannot be used again after successfully being exchanged for a `consentToken`. A one time token is only valid for 3 minutes and in case of it expiring, [Get Consents](https://docs.yapily.com/#e88743bc-a081-434b-b366-35370723da02) should be used to obtain the `consentToken`.

__Note:__ to receive a one time token, set `oneTimeToken` to `true` in your [Create Account Authorisation Request](https://docs.yapily.com/#2d2c9547-47b2-4e0e-a6e0-73451bc4a287) or [Create Payment Authorisation Request](https://docs.yapily.com/?version=latest#8e67c40c-4b0e-4f72-947c-065f1c84f46b).

response.name: 403 Forbidden
403 Forbidden
424 Failed Dependency

query.description: _Optional_. Force deletion of the consent irrespective of whether the response from the institution is successful or not.	 Default: false.

Conditional. Represents the user's login ID for the Institution to a personal account
Conditional. Represents the user's login ID for the Institution to a business account
Conditional. The IP address of the PSU

request.description:
Feature: `INITIATE_ACCOUNT_REQUEST`

Initiate the authorisation process and direct users to the login screen of their financial institution in order to give consent to access account data.

See [POST Create Account Authorisation](https://kb.yapily.com/display/YAD/POST+Create+Account+Authorisation+Request) in the Knowledge Base for more information.

Conditional. Represents the user's login ID for the Institution to a business account

request.description:
Features: 
- `INITIATE_DOMESTIC_PERIODIC_PAYMENT`
- `INITIATE_DOMESTIC_SCHEDULED_PAYMENT`
- `INITIATE_DOMESTIC_SINGLE_PAYMENT`
- `INITIATE_DOMESTIC_INSTANT_PAYMENT`
- `INITIATE_DOMESTIC_VARIABLE_RECURRING_PAYMENT`
- `INITIATE_INTERNATIONAL_PERIODIC_PAYMENT`
- `INITIATE_INTERNATIONAL_SCHEDULED_PAYMENT`
- `INITIATE_INTERNATIONAL_SINGLE_PAYMENT`

Used to initiate the authorisation process and direct users to the login screen of their financial institution in order to give their consent for a payment.

See [POST Create Payment Authorisation](https://kb.yapily.com/display/YAD/POST+Create+Payment+Authorisation+Request) in the Knowledge Base for more details.

response.name: 400 Bad Request

header.description: Conditional. Represents the user's login ID for the Institution to a personal account
Conditional. Represents the user's login ID for the Institution to a business account
Conditional. The IP address of the PSU

request.description:
Feature: `INITIATE_BULK_PAYMENT`

Used to initiate the payment authorisation process for a **business account** and direct users to the login screen of their financial institution in order to give their consent for a bulk payment. 

See [POST Create Bulk Payment Authorisation](https://kb.yapily.com/display/YAD/POST+Create+Bulk+Payment+Authorisation+Request) in the Knowledge Base for more information.

response.name: 400 Bad Request

header.description: Conditional. Represents the user's login ID for the Institution to a personal account
Conditional. Represents the user's login ID for the Institution to a business account
Conditional. The IP address of the PSU

request.description:
Feature: `INITIATE_ACCOUNT_REQUEST`

Initiate the authorisation process and direct users to the login screen of their financial institution in order to give consent to access account data.

See [POST Create Account Authorisation](https://kb.yapily.com/display/YAD/POST+Create+Account+Authorisation+Request) in the Knowledge Base for more information.

request.description:
Feature: `INITIATE_PRE_AUTHORISATIONv`

Used to redirect a user to an `Institution` to authorise a pre-authorisation request. Unlike [POST Create Account Authorisation Request](https://docs.yapily.com/#2d2c9547-47b2-4e0e-a6e0-73451bc4a287), an `Institution` with the `INITIATE_PRE_AUTHORIZATION` feature requires the user to first pre-authorise with the `Institution`. After the user is successfully redirected to the `Institution` and the request is authorised by the user, Yapily will generate a generic `Consent` that can not immediately be used to access the user's financial data. To access the user's financial data, the user needs authorise an additional request using [PUT Create Account Authorisation Request](https://docs.yapily.com/#75a4d838-ee3e-43c7-9b28-e1c100f73f1b) which will update the `Consent` with the required financial data features.

See [POST Create Account Pre-authorisation](https://kb.yapily.com/display/YAD/POST+Create+Account+Pre-authorisation+Request) in the Knowledge Base for more information.

request.description:
Feature: `INITIATE_DOMESTIC_SINGLE_PAYMENT `

Used exclusively with any `Institution` that requires pre-authorisation using [POST Create Account Pre-authorisation Request](https://docs.yapily.com/#80b7c51d-88b9-4008-949a-5abe380c73aa). This endpoint is used to update the generic `Consent` created from the pre-authorisation request to a financial data `Consent` with the relevant financial data features supported by the `Institution` and to then initiate the authorisation process and direct users to the login screen of the Institution to consent to their account information.

See [PUT Create Account Authorisation](https://kb.yapily.com/display/YAD/PUT+Create+Account+Authorisation+Request) in the Knowledge Base for more information.

header.description: The Consent token
Conditional. Represents the user's login ID for the Institution to a personal account

request.description:
Feature: 
- `INITIATE_ACCOUNT_REQUEST`

Used exclusively with any `Institution` that requires pre-authorisation using [POST Create Payment Pre-authorisation Request](https://docs.yapily.com/#76fca326-e605-462e-a7f7-ea4f4c9314ef). This endpoint is used to update the generic `Consent` created from the pre-authorisation request to a payment `Consent` with the relevant payment features supported by the `Institution` and to then initiate the authorisation process and direct users to the login screen of the `Institution` to give their consent to initiate the payment.

See [PUT Create Payment Authorisation Request](https://kb.yapily.com/display/YAD/PUT+Create+Payment+Authorisation+Request) in the Knowledge Base for more details.

request.description:
Feature: `ACCOUNT_DIRECT_DEBIT`

Get the list of direct debits for an account. 

See [GET Account Direct Debits](https://kb.yapily.com/display/YAD/GET+Get+Account+Direct+Debits) in the Knowledge Base for more information.

response.name: 200 OK (DIRECT DEBIT)
401 UNAUTHORIZED

request.description:
Feature: `ACCOUNT_PERIODIC_PAYMENTS`

Returns a list of periodic payments (standing orders in the UK) for a specific account.

See [GET Account Periodic Payments](https://kb.yapily.com/display/YAD/GET+Get+Account+Periodic+Payments) in the Knowledge Base for more information.

response.name: 401 UNAUTHORIZED

request.description:
Feature: `ACCOUNT_SCHEDULED_PAYMENT`

Get the list of scheduled payments for an account.

See [GET Account Scheduled Payments](https://kb.yapily.com/display/YAD/GET+Get+Account+Scheduled+Payments) in the Knowledge Base for more information.

response.name: 401 UNAUTHORIZED

request.description:
Feature: `ACCOUNT_STATEMENTS` Get the statements for a specific account. | Property | Description | Type | | - | - | - | | from | _**Optional**_. The date to start looking for account statements.

**Note:** For some institutions the **from** and **before** dates need to be within the range of the consent. | [Date](https://kb.yapily.com/display/YAD/Date+Format) | | before | _**Optional**_. The date to stop looking for account statements.

**Note:** For some institutions the **from** and **before** dates need to be within the range of the consent. | [Date](https://kb.yapily.com/display/YAD/Date+Format) |

response.name: 401 Unauthorized

header.description: Clickjacking protection: "deny" - no rendering within a frame, "sameorigin" - no rendering if origin mismatch

header.name: X-XSS-Protection
header.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) filter

response.name: 401 Unauthorized

request.description:
Feature: `ACCOUNT_TRANSACTIONS`

Used to get the transactions from a specific account. 

See [GET Transactions](https://kb.yapily.com/display/YAD/GET+Get+Transactions) in the Knowledge Base for more information.

response.name: 200 OK (No Pagination)
401 Unauthorized

query.description:
*Optional*. Include the merchant information in the transaction details.

Requires institution with feature: `ACCOUNT_TRANSACTIONS_WITH_MERCHANT`

*Optional*. Date time [ISO8601 format](/#date-time-format)

Note: For some institutions the **from** and **before** dates need to be within the range of the consent.

*Optional*. Date time [ISO8601 format](/#date-time-format)

Note: For some institutions the **from** and **before** dates need to be within the range of the consent.
*Optional*. Maximum number of transaction records per request.

*Optional*. 
Sorting by date ASCENDING: **date**

Sorting by date DESCENDING value: **-date**

response.name: 200 OK (Paginated results with limit of 10: 1-10)
200 OK (Paginated results with limit of 10: 11-20)
200 OK (Paginated results with limit of 10: 6540-6547)

request.description: Feature: `IDENTITY`

request.description:
Features: 
- `CREATE_DOMESTIC_SINGLE_PAYMENT`
- `CREATE_DOMESTIC_SINGLE_INSTANT_PAYMENT`
- `CREATE_DOMESTIC_SCHEDULED_PAYMENT`
- `CREATE_DOMESTIC_PERIODIC_PAYMENT`
- `CREATE_DOMESTIC_VARIABLE_RECURRING_PAYMENT`
- `CREATE_INTERNATIONAL_SINGLE_PAYMENT`
- `CREATE_INTERNATIONAL_SCHEDULED_PAYMENT`
- `CREATE_INTERNATIONAL_PERIODIC_PAYMENT`
- `CREATE_INTERNATIONAL_VARIABLE_RECURRING_PAYMENT`

Used to initiate a payment request at a bank on behalf of a user. 

See [POST Create Payment](https://kb.yapily.com/display/YAD/POST+Create+Payment+Request) in the Knowledge Base for more information.

response.name: 403 Forbidden
400 Bad Request
201 Created (DOMESTIC PAYMENT WITH PAYER FROM JOINT/BUSINESS ACCOUNT)

request.description:
Feature: `CREATE_BULK_PAYMENT`

Used to create a bulk payment request from a **business account**. 

See [POST Create Bulk Payment](https://kb.yapily.com/display/YAD/POST+Create+Bulk+Payment+Request) for more information.

403 Forbidden
